Content: Today is the 3rd day of the Fast launched by MP Venerable Athuraliye Rathana Thera. He launched the Fast demanding to remove Minister Rishad Bathiudeen, Governors Asath Sali and M.L.A.M. Hisbulla from their portfolios. He has staged the Fast near the Sri Dalada Maligawa in Kandy. Meanwhile Parliamentarian S. Viyaalendran has also launched a Fast supporting Venerable Athuraliye Rathana Thera. Former Minister of the Eastern Provincial Council R. Thurairathnam and a group of people have joined the Fast which is being held in front of the Mahathma Ghandi School in Batticaloe.
